title: Why the CDC Is Stressing the Importance of Schools Reopening This Fall

author.bio: Truth seeking American, tired of being censored and of friends becoming Communist totalitarians thinking they're virtuous.
author.bio_html: Truth seeking American, tired of being censored and of friends becoming Communist totalitarians thinking they're virtuous.

body: Meanwhile, in my town, they've just declared that ALL schools will be virtual and not meet in person when they start up next month.
body_html: Meanwhile, in my town, they've just declared that ALL schools will be virtual and not meet in person when they start up next month.

guild.description:
This guild is about News far and wide!

Sister guild: +Commentary

#1. Things that are posted to News should be stated like a fact in the Headline.

In the sense, Headline: X happened or X said this. Not Personal opinions. 

They should be reporting.

#2. Personal slant or commentary should go in the comments, not the Headline. Commentary content (like discussion commentator shows) are not News. Commentary content will be redirected to +Commentary which is for that purpose. 

If it's News but is more an opinion piece please add [Opinion] in the title, or post in a topic specific guild. 

#3. No screenshots; provide a link, provide a source.

See Posting Etiquette pin for further explanation.

post.title: Why the CDC Is Stressing the Importance of Schools Reopening This Fall

body:
Where I live they wanna do hybrid learning when we return on August 26.

The one issue is that it’s Massachusetts and the virus has been under control since fucking Memorial Day.

Rip senior year. 🤡🌎
